answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Quentin - I suggest you talk with Leonard Martin, Carrollton, TX City Manager.   This is a topic of interest and he's a wealth of information.
Leonard Martin
City Manager
City of Carollton, TX
Leonard.Martin2@cityofcarrollton.com
972-466-3001
Pam Muse
West Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
pmuse@transformgov.org
888-468-6450

author: Quentin McPhatter
text:
Some of my staff and I will be visiting a local wellness clinic tomorrow afternoon.  I was wondering if anyone had a survey that they could share where staff provided their opinion on the facility, quality, etc.
Thanks,
Quentin McPhatter
Interim City Manager
Kingsland, Georgia
title: Wellness Clinic Survey
